languages.text: {n}Гемункул рывком подвигается к вам, грозно нависая сверху, его лицо искажено гримасой ярости.{/n} "Это из-под моей руки выходят избранные творения, сеющие смерть. Это на моих эссенциях вершится их действо смерти. Только мои исследования не ограничены скудоумием, и лишь я в своих исканиях способен бросить вызов зловещим тайнам, чего другие друкари слепо страшатся и даже гемункулы трусливо избегают!"

traits.locale_text: "Я?! На побегушках у ведьм?!" {n}Гемункул рывком подвигается к вам, грозно нависая сверху, его лицо искажено гримасой ярости.{/n} "Это из-под моей руки выходят избранные творения, сеющие смерть. Это на моих эссенциях эмоций и стимуляторах существует вся Прорва. Только мои исследования не ограничены скудоумием и лишь я в своих исканиях способен бросить вызов зловещим тайнам, чего другие друкари слепо страшатся и даже гемункулы трусливо избегают!"

languages.text: {n}The Haemonculus lunges forward, looming menacingly over you, his face twisted with fury.{/n} "Mine is the hand that shapes the greatest creations of sowing death. Mine are the essences that sustain their spectacle of carnage. And mine are the delvings unfettered by any weakness of the mind, for I am the only one capable of pondering the blood-curdling secrets the Drukhari blindly fear and that even other Haemonculi are too cowardly to behold!"
languages.original_text: {n}Гемункул рывком подвигается к вам, грозно нависая сверху, его лицо искажено гримасой ярости.{/n} "Это из-под моей руки выходят избранные творения, сеющие смерть. Это на моих эссенциях вершится их действо смерти. Только мои исследования не ограничены скудоумием, и лишь я в своих исканиях способен бросить вызов зловещим тайнам, чего другие друкари слепо страшатся и даже гемункулы трусливо избегают!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The Haemonculus rushes forward and looms over you, his face twisted with rage.{/n} "Mine is the hand shapes the greatest death-sowing creations. Mine are the essences that sustain their spectacle of carnage. And mine are the delvings unfettered by the feebleness of the mind, for I am the only one capable of pondering the blood-curdling secrets that strike blind fear into the Drukhari and even deter Haemonculi who are too meek to dare!"

{n}The Haemonculus rushes forward and looms over you, his face twisted with rage.{/n} "Mine is the hand shapes the greatest death-sowing creations. Mine are the essences that sustain their spectacle of carnage. And mine are the delvings unfettered by the feebleness of the mind, for I am the only one capable of pondering the blood-curdling secrets that strike blind fear into the Drukhari and even deter Haemonculi who are too meek to dare!"

Mine are the essences that sustain their spectacle of carnage. And mine are the delvings unfettered by any weakness of the mind, for I am the only one capable of pondering the blood-curdling secrets the Drukhari blindly fear and that even other Haemonculi are too cowardly to behold!"

{n}The Haemonculus lunges forward, looming menacingly over you, his face twisted with fury.{/n} "Mine is the hand that shapes the greatest creations of sowing death. Mine are the essences that sustain their spectacle of carnage. And mine are the delvings unfettered by any weakness of the mind, for I am the only one capable of pondering the blood-curdling secrets the Drukhari blindly fear and that even other Haemonculi are too cowardly to behold!"

languages.text: {n}L'hémoncule se rue vers vous d'un air menaçant, son visage déformé par la colère.{/n} « De ma main naissent les créations les plus mortelles qui soient. Les essences qui permettent leurs spectaculaires carnages sont miennes. Et c'est à moi qu'il incombe d'étudier sans entraves les secrets qui glacent le sang, ces mystères devant lesquels les Drukharis tremblent de crainte, ces énigmes que même les autres hémoncules sont trop lâches pour tenter de résoudre ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus lunges forward, looming menacingly over you, his face twisted with fury.{/n} "Mine is the hand that shapes the greatest creations of sowing death. Mine are the essences that sustain their spectacle of carnage. And mine are the delvings unfettered by any weakness of the mind, for I am the only one capable of pondering the blood-curdling secrets the Drukhari blindly fear and that even other Haemonculi are too cowardly to behold!"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'hémoncule se rue vers vous d'un air menaçant, son visage déformé par la colère.{/n} « De ma main naissent les créations les plus mortelles qui soient. Les essences qui permettent leurs spectaculaires carnages sont miennes. Et c'est à moi qu'il incombe d'étudier sans entraves les secrets qui glacent le sang, ces mystères devant lesquels les Drukhari tremblent de crainte, ces énigmes que même les autres hémoncules sont trop lâches pour tenter de résoudre ! »

languages.text: {n}血伶人气势汹汹地朝你扑了过来，脸愤怒地扭曲着。{/n}“我的双手创造出了最伟大的死亡机器！我的精华供养着整座竞技场的屠杀盛宴！我的思想不受任何弱点的束缚，因为只有我才敢思考黑暗灵族盲目惧怕的血腥秘密，就连其他血伶人都不敢直视那些秘密！”
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus lunges forward, looming menacingly over you, his face twisted with fury.{/n} "Mine is the hand that shapes the greatest creations of sowing death. Mine are the essences that sustain their spectacle of carnage. And mine are the delvings unfettered by any weakness of the mind, for I am the only one capable of pondering the blood-curdling secrets the Drukhari blindly fear and that even other Haemonculi are too cowardly to behold!"

traits.locale_text: {n}血伶人气势汹汹地朝你扑了过来，脸愤怒地扭曲着。{/n}“我的双手创造出了最伟大的死亡机器！我的精华供养着整座竞技场的屠杀盛宴！我的思想不受任何弱点的束缚，因为只有我才敢思考黑暗灵族盲目惧怕的血腥秘密，就连其他血伶人都不敢直视那些秘密！”

languages.text: {n}Der Haemonculus schießt vor, baut sich bedrohlich über dir auf, sein Gesicht wutverzerrt.{/n} "Meine Hand ist es, die die größten aller todbringenden Schöpfungen formt. Meine Essenzen sind es, die das Spektakel des Gemetzels nähren. Und meine Forschungen sind es, die nicht durch die Schwächen des Verstands gefesselt werden. Denn nur ich bin in der Lage, über die entsetzlichen Geheimnisse nachzudenken, welche die Drukhari so blind fürchten und welche selbst andere Haemonculi zu feige zu betrachten sind!"
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus lunges forward, looming menacingly over you, his face twisted with fury.{/n} "Mine is the hand that shapes the greatest creations of sowing death. Mine are the essences that sustain their spectacle of carnage. And mine are the delvings unfettered by any weakness of the mind, for I am the only one capable of pondering the blood-curdling secrets the Drukhari blindly fear and that even other Haemonculi are too cowardly to behold!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Haemonculus schießt vor, baut sich bedrohlich über dir auf, sein Gesicht wutverzerrt.{/n} "Meine Hand ist es, die die größten aller todbringenden Schöpfungen formt. Meine Essenzen sind es, die das Spektakel des Gemetzels nähren. Und meine Forschungen sind es, die nicht durch die Schwächen des Verstands gefesselt werden. Denn nur ich bin in der Lage, über die entsetzlichen Geheimnisse nachzudenken, welche die Drukhari so blind fürchten und welche selbst andere Haemonculi zu feige zu betrachten sind!"

languages.text: {n}El Hemónculo se echa hacia delante con un gesto amenazante y el rostro airado.{/n} «Mis manos dan forma a los seres más sanguinarios. Mis esencias posibilitan que continúe su carnívoro espectáculo. ¡Mis investigaciones están carentes de restricciones morales, pues solo yo soy capaz de indagar en los secretos que hacen helar la sangre a aquellos Drukhari cegados por su miedo! ¡E incluso otros Hemónculos que son demasiado cobardes para siquiera contemplarlos!».
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus lunges forward, looming menacingly over you, his face twisted with fury.{/n} "Mine is the hand that shapes the greatest creations of sowing death. Mine are the essences that sustain their spectacle of carnage. And mine are the delvings unfettered by any weakness of the mind, for I am the only one capable of pondering the blood-curdling secrets the Drukhari blindly fear and that even other Haemonculi are too cowardly to behold!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El Hemónculo se echa hacia delante con un gesto amenazante y el rostro airado.{/n} «Mis manos dan forma a los seres más sanguinarios. Mis esencias posibilitan que continúe su carnívoro espectáculo. ¡Mis investigaciones están carentes de restricciones morales, pues solo yo soy capaz de indagar en los secretos que hacen helar la sangre a aquellos Drukhari cegados por su miedo! ¡E incluso otros Hemónculos que son demasiado cobardes para siquiera contemplarlos!».

languages.text: {n}ハモンキュラスは前方に突進し、怒りに顔をゆがめながら威嚇するように迫ってくる。{/n}「私の手は、死を蒔く偉大な創造物を形作る。私のそれは、殺戮のスペクタクルを支えるエッセンスである。デュカーリが盲目的に恐れ、他のハモンキュラスでさえ臆病で見ようとしない、血も凍るような秘密を考えることができるのは私だけなのだ！」
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus lunges forward, looming menacingly over you, his face twisted with fury.{/n} "Mine is the hand that shapes the greatest creations of sowing death. Mine are the essences that sustain their spectacle of carnage. And mine are the delvings unfettered by any weakness of the mind, for I am the only one capable of pondering the blood-curdling secrets the Drukhari blindly fear and that even other Haemonculi are too cowardly to behold!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ハモンキュラスは前方に突進し、怒りに顔をゆがめながら威嚇するように迫ってくる。{/n}「私の手は、死を蒔く偉大な創造物を形作る。私のそれは、殺戮のスペクタクルを支えるエッセンスである。デュカーリが盲目的に恐れ、他のハモンキュラスでさえ臆病で見ようとしない、血も凍るような秘密を考えることができるのは私だけなのだ！」

languages.text: {n}Yüzü öfkeden buruşan Haimonkulus, ileri atılıyor ve tehditkârca önünde duruyor.{/n} "Ölüm bahşeden en büyük yaratımları şekillendiren el, benim elimdir. Onların katliam gösterisine devam etmesini sağlayan öz, benim özümdür. Zihnin zayıflıklarından bağımsız çalışmalar, benim çalışmalarımdır. Nihayetinde Drukharilerin kör bir korku beslediği, diğer Haimonkulusların bile önünde duramayacak kadar ödlek kaldıkları, kan donduran sırları sorgulama kabiliyetine sahip olan da yalnızca benimdir."
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus lunges forward, looming menacingly over you, his face twisted with fury.{/n} "Mine is the hand that shapes the greatest creations of sowing death. Mine are the essences that sustain their spectacle of carnage. And mine are the delvings unfettered by any weakness of the mind, for I am the only one capable of pondering the blood-curdling secrets the Drukhari blindly fear and that even other Haemonculi are too cowardly to behold!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yüzü öfkeden buruşan Haimonkulus ileri atılıyor, tehditkâr bir hâlde önünde duruyor.{/n} "Ölüm bahşeden en büyük yaratımları şekillendiren el, benim elimdir. Onların katliam gösterisine devam etmesini sağlayan öz, benim özümdür. Ve zihnin zayıflıklarından bağımsız çalışmalar, benim çalışmalarımdır. Nihayetinde Drukharilerin kör bir korku beslediği, diğer Haimonkulusların bile önünde duramayacak kadar ödlek kaldıkları, kan donduran sırları sorgulama kabiliyetine sahip olan, yalnızca benimdir.
